articles.title: An injury scare had a Providence goalie in net for the Bruins on Thursday
articles.description:
“I’m just glad I didn’t screw it up."

The post An injury scare had a Providence goalie in net for the Bruins on Thursday appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Providence goalie Michael DiPietro played for the Bruins on February 26 due to an injury scare.
DiPietro expressed relief after successfully stepping in for injured goalie Jeremy Swayman.
This situation raises concerns about the Bruins' goalie depth impacting local fans' playoff hopes.

articles.title: N.H. woman arrested for alleged murder of her baby following 11-month investigation
articles.description:
Police first found the dead infant in Pine Island Pond in Manchester, N.H. on the afternoon of March 27, 2025.

The post N.H. woman arrested for alleged murder of her baby following 11-month investigation appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: N.H. woman arrested for allegedly murdering her baby after 11-month investigation.
Infant's body was discovered in Pine Island Pond on March 27, 2025.
The case raises concerns about child safety and support services in the Boston area.

articles.title: Police video shows Vince McMahon’s 100 mph car crash in Connecticut
articles.description:
McMahon, now 80, was driving his 2024 Bentley Continental GT at more than 100 mph when he crashed in the town of Westport, according to state police.

The post Police video shows Vince McMahon’s 100 mph car crash in Connecticut appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Vince McMahon crashed his 2024 Bentley at over 100 mph in Westport, Connecticut.
The 80-year-old WWE executive was involved in a serious car accident on February 26.
Local authorities are investigating the incident, raising concerns about speeding in residential areas.

articles.title: Way overdue on checking a car’s transmission fluid
articles.description:
John Paul, AAA Northeast's Car Doctor, hears from a reader worried they may have waited a bit too long to have their car’s transmission fluid checked.

The post Way overdue on checking a car’s transmission fluid appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: John Paul advises Boston drivers to regularly check transmission fluid to prevent costly repairs.
AAA Northeast emphasizes the importance of timely maintenance for vehicle longevity and safety.
Neglecting fluid checks can lead to transmission failure, affecting daily commutes for Boston residents.

articles.title: South Shore school evacuated after snow causes ‘structural stress’ on roof
articles.description:
"Roofing specialists were contracted earlier in the week and have been on site to support snow removal and a structural engineer is coming in to assess," the school said.

The post South Shore school evacuated after snow causes ‘structural stress’ on roof appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: South Shore school evacuated due to snow causing structural stress on the roof.
Roofing specialists were contracted earlier this week for snow removal and assessment.
Local students and staff affected by evacuation as safety measures are implemented.

articles.title: David Ortiz changes his tune on Rafael Devers after previous criticism
articles.description:
"Things happen in the game. Other than that, that’s my boy. That’s a kid I got to meet when he was 15."

The post David Ortiz changes his tune on Rafael Devers after previous criticism appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: David Ortiz praises Rafael Devers, stating, 'that’s my boy' after earlier criticism.
Ortiz met Devers when he was just 15 years old, highlighting their connection.
Ortiz's support may boost Devers' morale among Boston Red Sox fans and players.
